meanings.definition: To have transported or moved by boat.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen boatlifted their catch back to shore.
meanings.sent2: They boatlifted supplies to the remote island.
meanings.sent3: The pirates boatlifted the treasure chest with ease.
meanings.sent4: The rescue team boatlifted the stranded hikers to safety.
meanings.sent5: The explorers boatlifted their equipment across the river.

meanings.definition: The act of lifting or raising a boat.
meanings.sent1: The boatlifted was used to hoist the vessel out of the water.
meanings.sent2: The boatlifted at the marina needed maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The boatlifted creaked as it raised the boat high above the dock.
meanings.sent4: The boatlifted smoothly raised the yacht for repairs.
meanings.sent5: The boatlifted operator carefully controlled the ascent of the boat.
